name: Scrap Out! v. 0.5
description:
Scrapbooking plus Breakout equals ScrapOut! Controls: F2 — toggle SFX
F3 — toggle music
F4 — toggle fullscreen (you should approve browser request) Credits: Eight months of hard work — Nick Kirylau aka lone game maker
Graphics — inspired by and taken from PixelScrapper.com
Music — Deep East Music
SFX — some free SFX resourcesSpecial thanks to:
Marisa Lerin
Janet Scott
Erich Wissenshaft My greatest discovery of the last year was the scrapbooking. It has amazed me with neat details and intricate textures. Then I found PixelScrapper.com and decided to make a game with it. I became sure to make some Breakout clone. After all, this kind of games was the love at first sight of my youth.
Hope you'll like this short demo. Have fun! ^_^ We can chat on twitter or via the comment section below if you wish :)
...and consider donating, please.
